summary: HAVE HAD 3 OF 4 TOWMAX TIRES!  THE FIRST TIRE GOT A BUBBLE IN IT AND WAS REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY, THE SECOND TIRE EXPANDED AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED LAST SUMMER, THE THIRD TIRE LITERALLY FELL APART TOWING THIS PAST WEEKEND!  WE REPLACED THE FOURTH TIRE THIS WEEK, BECAUSE WE DIDN'T WANT ANY ISSUES TOWING!  WE HAVE DAMAGE TO THE THE RV FROM THE TIRE THAT BLOW OUT!!  WE CAN NOT FIND ANY INFORMATION ON WHO MAKES THE TOWMAX-POWER KING !
